short_summary: Stabilisation de la mine de charbon N° 7
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWC) has a requirement for the stabilization of two coal mine pits from the needs of three local residents and one government institutional client. The successful contractor will provide a Pre-built Bunk House for three government employees that work on mine sites.
